price: (75) They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance.[1282]
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: [1282]- Maintaining and protecting their "gods."  Another interpretation is that they (i.e., the gods) will be soldiers set against them in Hellfire.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
